name: 23 Words
description: Unscramble 23 words, one by one, without running out of time.

name: Absurdle
description: An adversarial version of Wordle that actively avoids giving you the answer.

name: Actorle
description: Guess the movie actor based on the given information, with each guess revealing matching information.

name: Actorle - Fill The Grid
description: Fill the grid with actors that are cast in movies from each cell's corresponding row and column.

name: Actorle - Storyboard
description: Rearrange the movie frames in chronological order.

name: Actorle TV
description: Guess the TV actor based on the given information, with each guess revealing matching information.

name: Adoptle
description: Guess the name of a pet that is up for adoption, given a picture of them.

name: Airport Guessr
description: Guess the airport given its satellite image.

name: Alphalock
description: Word puzzle game inspired by Wordle and Mastermind.

name: Angle
description: Guess the angle in 4 guesses or less.

name: AniGuessr
description: A collection of daily games related to Japanese animation.

name: Archiguessr
description: Guess the name of the architecture, given a series of pictures.

name: Artle
description: Guess the artist of the shown work of art.

name: Balatrodle
description: Guess the Joker from the game Balatro.

name: Bandle
description: Guess the song, one instrument at a time (sort of).

name: Basketball 5
description: A collection of daily games related to basketball.

name: Bazaar Doku
description: Doku-style trivia game for The Bazaar.

name: Bells & Whistles
description: Fill the grid with bells and whistles, matching the group numbers on the rows and columns.

name: Betweenle
description: Guess the secret word hidden between other words before running out of guesses.

name: BingeWatcher
description: Guess the daily movie title by revealing its details.

name: Birdie Game
description: Guess the bird from cropped images and audio.

name: Birdle
description: Identify today's bird in 6 guesses or less.

name: Birdle (like Wordle)
description: Guess the 5-letter bird name in 6 guesses or less.

name: Blunderwall
description: Find the secret word on the Blunderwall in 4 tries.

name: Boggdle
description: Search for the best 3 words you can find in the Boggle grid.

name: Box Office Game
description: Guess the top five movies in the US domestic box office for the given weekend.

name: Bracket City
description: Solve the clues within brackets, eventually completing the puzzle. (From The Atlantic)

name: BrainBashers Daily 30 Seconds
description: Try to solve the arithmetic questions in 30 seconds, but it is okay if you go over.

name: BrainBashers Daily Puzzle
description: A daily brainteaser from BrainBashers.

name: Breadle
description: Solve the daily 5-letter word that is related to food.

name: Brickdle
description: Guess the number of pieces in the pictured LEGO set.

name: Buzzled
description: Color each hex cell black or yellow to satisfy the target sums along the edges.

name: Calcle
description: Guess the numbers in the equation in 5 attempts or less.

name: Cancelwise
description: Cancel numbers in a way that the remaining tiles add up to the target numbers.

name: Capitale
description: Guess the world capital in as few attempts as possible with the given clues.

name: Cardle
description: Correctly identify the pictured car's make, model, and year.

name: CarGuesser
description: Guess the brand, model, and year of a car given pictures of parts of it.

name: Cartoonguessr
description: Guess the cartoon character within 15 guesses.

name: Categories
description: Group the words in the grid into the 4 secret categories, like Connections or Conexo.

name: Catfishing
description: Guess the Wikipedia article by its categories. 10 rounds per day.

name: Cell Tower
description: Divide the grid into regions such that each region represents a word.

name: Chainagram
description: Make a chain linking two words together by changing one letter and making an anagram at each step.

name: Chemdle
description: Solve the daily organic chemistry problem.

name: Chess.com Daily Puzzle
description: Solve the daily chess puzzle from chess.com.

name: Chessguessr
description: Given a snapshot from a chess game, guess the next 5 moves played.

name: Chessle
description: Guess today's entire opening Chess sequence.

name: Chiddle
description: Try to find five high scoring words in the puzzle grid, like Boggle.

name: Chronle
description: Put the events in the order of when they happened.

name: Chrono
description: Put the events in chronological order in 3 tries or less.

name: Chronophoto
description: Guess the year in which each historical picture was taken.

name: Cine2Nerdle
description: Rearrange the tiles into groups that represent movies/themes. Includes both Original and Reversal.

name: Cinematrix
description: Fill out the grid with movies matching the criteria of each cell's row and column. Changes every weekday.

name: Circuits
description: Place words into the empty boxes so that each connection of two words make a compound word.

name: ClickWord
description: Place letter tiles on the board to make words and score points! Keep placing tiles until you run out.

name: Clues By Sam
description: Use the clues to figure out which characters are innocent and which are criminals.

name: Cluewords
description: Solve the clues to find the hidden words.

name: Codenames Daily
description: A daily set of puzzles from Codenames, a word association game.

name: Collections
description: Guess the category of the three hidden words by revealing one letter at a time.

name: Colorfle
description: Figure out the color composition of the given color.

name: ColorGuesser
description: Guess the actual color that each of the color names represent.

name: Combinations
description: Create words using combinations of letters from the grid.

name: Compound Your Joy
description: Rearrange the words into a chain of 2-word concepts.

name: Concludle
description: Guess the secret answer from a series of clues.

name: Conexo
description: Form groups of 4 words that have something in common.

name: Connections Game
description: Group words that share a common thread. Basically a copy of NYT Connections but with 3 difficulty modes and a good archive.

name: Contexto
description: Guess words to see how close they are to the secret word in terms of context, eventually guessing the secret word.

name: Costcodle
description: Guess the price of the given Costco item.

name: Countryle
description: Guess the country in as few attempts as possible with the given clues.

name: Couples
description: Guess the chained word pairs in 3 tries.

name: Couplit
description: Arrange the letters to spell out a phrase based on today's theme.

name: Cracked Sudoku
description: Fill the cells with numbers 1-9 without repeating numbers in a dark-outlined group or along a colored run line.

name: CraftWord
description: Get from the starting word to the ending word in as few words as possible. At each step you can either add a letter, remove a letter, change a letter, or rearrange letters.

name: Crossherd
description: A daily mini crossword from Clever Goat.

name: Crosstune
description: A music crossword puzzle where the clues include song audio.

name: Crosswordle
description: Fill in the grid to logically fit a series of Wordle guesses.

name: crosswordle.com
description: Swap tiles to solve multiple Wordle puzzles crossed together.

name: crosswordle.org
description: Solve multiple Wordle puzzles crossed together.

name: cryptle
description: Slide each row of letters in to the right position to guess the secret word. You have 5 guesses.

name: Cyphr
description: Guess letters to form a word on each row of the pyramid, starting from the top row.

name: Daily Akari
description: A classic logic puzzle game where you must light up the grid.

name: Daily Dozen Trivia
description: Answer 9 trivia questions from various categories.

name: Daily Fact or Fiction
description: Guess whether today's statement is fact or fiction.

name: Daily Fill-Ins
description: Properly fill in the clue-less crossword with all of the words from the given word list.

name: Daily Jingle
description: Guess the melody within 5 tries.

name: Daily Tens
description: Guess the top 10 items of today's category.

name: DayBrix
description: Daily tetris-style falling blocks game.

name: Daydle
description: Guess the year of a historical event that happened on this day in history.

name: Daydoku
description: Place the polyominoes on the calendar so that every cell is covered except ones that correspond to today's date.

name: DBDle
description: Test your Dead by Daylight knowledge in these daily games.

name: Decipher
description: Solve the daily cryptogram to reveal the quote.

name: Decodex
description: A daily cryptography game. Decode a nice quote every day!

name: Disney Heardle
description: Guess the Disney song from listening to small parts of it.

name: Disorderly
description: Order the items correctly based on the given criteria.

name: Disordle
description: Diagnose the patient with a disorder based on their symptoms.

name: Dodeku
description: Make the sum of each row and column match the numbers on the perimeter.

name: Domino Fit
description: Fill the board with dominoes so that the dots add up in each row and column.

name: Doople
description: Chain word combinations together to fit the given clues.

name: Dordle
description: Solve 2 Wordle puzzles at the same time.

name: Dotadle
description: Guess the Dota characters in these daily quizzes.

name: Dungleon
description: Guess the dungeon's composition in 6 guesses.

name: Duolock Game
description: Solve two Alphalock puzzles at the same time. Includes a Padlock (number) mode.

name: Duotrigordle
description: Solve 32 Wordle puzzles at the same time.

name: Echo Chess
description: Solve the chess puzzle where you have to capture all black pieces to win and your piece becomes what it captures.

name: Eightile
description: Unscramble each word, adding a new letter each time. You have 5 minutes.

name: Emoji Quiz - Movies
description: Use the emojis to guess the title of the movie.

name: Emoji Quiz - TV
description: Use the emojis to guess the title of the tv show.

name: Emoji Quiz - Video Games
description: Use the emojis to guess the title of the video game.

name: Emoji Test
description: Guess the hidden word represented by emojis.

name: Enchant Wordle
description: Guess the card from Magic the Gathering within 20 tries.

name: Eruptle
description: Guess the 10 items that fit the prompt, kind of like Family Feud.

name: Estimadle
description: Estimate the number of circles within 10 seconds.

name: Estimate Me
description: Estimate something new every day!

name: Face Guessr
description: Guess the pixelated face of today's notable figure.

name: Facedle
description: Guess the famous person in the partially covered picture.

name: faces
description: Guess the names of the movie stars that are blended together into a single image.

name: Factle
description: Find and properly rank the top 5 answers for the given criteria. You have 5 guesses to get it correct.

name: Factle Sports
description: Find and properly rank the top 5 answers for the given sports-related criteria. You have 5 guesses to get it correct.

name: Fibble
description: Wordle but it lies to you.  (Like Lirdle)

name: Figure
description: Clear all of the tiles before running out of moves.

name: Fishdle
description: Guess the fish based on its silhouette and number of letters.

name: Flagdle
description: Guess the country by its flag.

name: Flagdoku
description: Fill in the grid with flags that meet the criteria of both the row and column corresponding to their cell.

name: Flagle
description: Guess the flag in 5 guesses or less.

name: Flagle Game
description: Guess the hidden flag in six guesses, revealing where your guess overlaps with the solution after each try.

name: Flickle
description: Guess the movie based on the given video clips.

name: Flipple
description: Transform the starting word to the target word by changing one letter at a time

name: Fluxis
description: Complete the chain by entering words that satisfy their category and build off the previous word. (From The Atlantic)

name: Foodguessr
description: Guess what country each of the food dishes are from.

name: Framed
description: Guess the movie from 6 frames.

name: Fusele
description: A Wordle variant in which each row has a unique twist.

name: Futdoku
description: Guess 9 soccer players that fill the FUTDOKU grid.

name: Gamedle Artwork
description: Guess the video game by its artwork.

name: Gamedle Classic
description: Guess the video game by its cover.

name: Gamedle Guess
description: Guess the video game by its specifications.

name: Gamedle Keywords
description: Guess the video game by keywords.

name: Gaps
description: Guess the movie based on the blanks and given information.

name: Geocircles
description: Given a streetview location, place progressively smaller circles on the map to help pinpoint its exact coordinates.

name: GeoConnections
description: Group mostly geography-related pictures that share a common theme.

name: Geodle
description: Guess today's mystery country within 7 guesses.

name: GeoGrid
description: Fill in the grid with countries that match each cell's corresponding row and column categories.

name: Globle
description: Guess the mystery country, given how close it is to each guessed country.

name: Globle Capitals
description: Guess the mystery world capital, given how close it is to each guessed world capital.

name: Gram Jam
description: Clear the board in under 20 swaps, clearing letters by creating words on full rows or columns.

name: graphs.world
description: Select the dataset that fits the displayed graph.

name: Griddle
description: Form words by placing letters on the board to get the highest score you can in this Scrabble-like daily game.

name: Guess My Word
description: Make guesses and see if they are alphabetically before or after the secret word.

name: Guess The Angle
description: Guess today's angle in 4 guesses or less.

name: Guess The Audio
description: Guess the song from listening to small parts of it, getting a clue after each guess.

name: Guess The Book
description: Guess the book based on short snippets and details.

name: Guess The Game
description: Guess the video game by its cropped screenshots.

name: Guess The House
description: Guess the price of the house by its pictures and information.

name: Guess The Jumpshot
description: Guess the NBA player based on a silhouette video of their jumpshot.

name: Guess The Logo
description: Guess the logo which becomes less blurry with each guess.

name: Guess The Movie
description: Guess the movie based on its screenshots and details.

name: GuessTen
description: Guess the top ten entries of today's category.

name: Harmonies: Music Connections
description: Find the groups of 4 that share some musical theme.

name: Heardle 1950's
description: Guess the 1950's song from listening to small parts of it.

name: Heardle 1960's
description: Guess the 1960's song from listening to small parts of it.

name: Heardle 1970's
description: Guess the 1970's song from listening to small parts of it.

name: Heardle 1980's
description: Guess the 1980's song from listening to small parts of it.

name: Heardle 1990's
description: Guess the 1990's song from listening to small parts of it.

name: Heardle 2000's
description: Guess the 2000's song from listening to small parts of it.

name: Heardle 2010's
description: Guess the 2010's song from listening to small parts of it.

name: Heardle Daily
description: Guess the song by listening to small parts of it.

name: Heardle TV Themes
description: Guess the TV theme song from listening to small parts of it.

name: hello wordl
description: Play Wordle puzzles from 4 to 11 letters long.

name: Hexcodle
description: Guess the 6-digit hex code of the shown color in 5 tries or less.

name: Hexcodle Mini
description: Guess the 3-digit hex code of the shown color in 5 tries or less. Easier version of Hexcodle.

name: Hidden Mirrors
description: A unique daily symmetry game where you try to match the given pattern.

name: Hitori Conquest
description: Eliminate cells in the grid to remove row or column duplicates and satisfy the given rules.

name: Housle
description: Guess the price of the house, given pictures of parts of the house.

name: HowLongToBeat Daily Challenge
description: Guess how long it takes to beat the given video game. Use power-ups if you need help.

name: Huewords
description: Fill the partitioned grid with letters to form 5-letter words, choosing from the given groups of letters.

name: I Called Game
description: Identify key details from an image of a historical NBA game to answer 6 questions.

name: Immaculate Footy
description: Fill out the grid with soccer players matching the criteria of each cell's row and column.

name: Immaculate Grid: Baseball
description: Fill out the grid with baseball players matching the criteria of each cell's row and column.

name: Immaculate Grid: Hockey
description: Fill out the grid with hockey players matching the criteria of each cell's row and column.

name: Immaculate Grid: Men's Basketball
description: Fill out the grid with men's basketball players matching the criteria of each cell's row and column.

name: Immaculate Grid: Pro Football
description: Fill out the grid with pro football players matching the criteria of each cell's row and column.

name: Immaculate Grid: Women's Basketball
description: Fill out the grid with women's basketball players matching the criteria of each cell's row and column.

name: Isaacle
description: Guess the items from the game The Binding of Isaac in these daily quizzes.

name: Isaaconnect
description: Group items from The Binding of Isaac that share a common theme.

name: IYKYK
description: Guess what today's acronym stands for. By the makers of the card game CultureTags.

name: Jigsaw Explorer
description: Solve the jigsaw puzzles, two new puzzles everyday.

name: Jumblie
description: Find the 4 themed words hidden amongst the letters such that all letters are used exactly once.

name: Juxtastat
description: For 5 rounds, guess which of the two regions better fits the given criteria.

name: Karat
description: Turn the rings of the ingot until each side forms a word - in 24 turns or less.

name: Keyword
description: Find the target word by guessing the final letter of the vertical words.

name: Kinda Hard Golf
description: A challenging daily golf game.

name: LA Times Crossword
description: Solve today's crossword from the Los Angeles Times.

name: Langle
description: Guess the world language from a few example sentences.

name: Letroso
description: Guess the secret word that can be up to 10 letters long.

name: Letteripher
description: Guess letters to reveal all words of some daily category without losing all your lives.

name: LetterLoop
description: Place the 8 letters in the circle to make two 5-letter words that share their first and last letters.

name: Letterset
description: Spell words with the given letters to earn points. Longer words help prolong the game and earn more points.

name: Lex.Games - By A Vowel
description: Unjumble five words by inserting a unique vowel into each word.

name: Lex.Games - Conlextions
description: Group words that share a common thread, like Connections.

name: Lex.Games - Lexicogs
description: Solve today's clues by combining blocks of letters. Like the game 7 Little Words.

name: Lex.Games - Mini Crossword
description: A daily mini crossword from Lex.Games

name: Lex.Games - Six Appeal
description: Guess the 6-letter word, like Wordle, but you don't have to guess real words. The answer is a real word.

name: Lex.Games - Square Dance
description: Make a word with each group of letters, but you must add a letter to each word.

name: Lexicle
description: You have 8 guesses to find the secret word based on its meaning.

name: lichess.org Daily Puzzle
description: Solve the daily chess puzzle from lichess.org.

name: Lingule
description: Guess the language of the today's word in 6 guesses or less.

name: LinkedIn - Crossclimb
description: Guess the words that fit the clues, then rearrange to create a word ladder. Does not require a LinkedIn account.

name: LinkedIn - Pinpoint
description: Guess today's category given as few clues as possible. Does not require a LinkedIn account.

name: LinkedIn - Queens
description: Place queens on the board such that exactly one is in each row, column, and color region. Does not require a LinkedIn account.

name: LinkedIn - Tango
description: Fill in the grid properly with suns and moons. Does not require a LinkedIn account.

name: LinkedIn - Zip
description: Connect the numbered dots in the grid in order, starting at 1. Does not require a LinkedIn account.

name: LINKR
description: Link each pair of numbered points together in three daily puzzles.

name: Linxicon
description: Connect two random words by creating a chain of new words that bridge the gap in their meanings.

name: Lirdle
description: Wordle except each line contains a lie. (Like Fibble)

name: List Them All!
description: List all of the items that fit today's category.

name: Locatle
description: Guess the country that the picture was taken in.

name: Logiquiz
description: A self-referential logic quiz with 5 difficulty modes.

name: LoLdle
description: A bunch of daily games where you guess the champion from League of Legends.

name: Lyricle
description: Guess the song from the given lyrics.

name: Mahjong Handle
description: Guess the Riichi Mahjong hand in 6 tries.

name: MapGame
description: Use the map to guess a country, getting new hints after each guess.

name: MapTap
description: Click as close as you can to the given world cities, 5 rounds per day.

name: Mathdle
description: Reach the target number using the given numbers and operations.

name: Mathler
description: Find the hidden calculation that equals the given number.

name: Matle
description: Guess the missing chess pieces on the board to match the checkmate from a real chess match.

name: Mazele
description: Guess the correct maze path in the grid in 6 tries or less.

name: Metaflora
description: Guess plants to see where they share common ancestors with the mystery plant, eventually guessing the mystery plant.

name: Metazooa
description: Guess animals to see where they share common ancestors with the mystery animal, eventually guessing the mystery animal.

name: MinecraftDle
description: Test your Minecraft knowledge in these daily games.

name: Minecraftle
description: Guess the crafting recipe from the game Minecraft.

name: Mini Crossword (The Observer)
description: A daily mini crossword from The Observer.

name: Minute Cryptic
description: Solve today's cryptic clue.

name: Mislettered
description: Solve the word or phrase by guessing one letter at a time.

name: MLB Pickle
description: Guess today's mystery MLB player within nine guesses.

name: Monster Hunter-dle
description: Guess the monster from the Monster Hunter series.

name: More/Less
description: Decide which option has more or less, and keep going until you get one wrong. There are 3 categories to play.

name: morsle
description: Guess the word played out loud in Morse code. You have 21 guesses, but replaying the audio counts as a guess. Features a very helpful cheatsheet.

name: Morsle (decipher.wiki)
description: Same as Wordle but you input your letters using Morse Code, a tool for beginners to learn Morse Code.

name: Movie Grid
description: Fill out the grid with movies matching the criteria of each cell's row and column.

name: Movie Pyramid
description: Fill in the cells of the pyramid with movies that match the criteria of their given row.

name: Movie Reveal
description: Guess today's hidden movie by revealing clues that cost you points!

name: Movie Snake
description: Guess movies that match pairs of criteria until all clues have been used.

name: Movie to Movie
description: Connect two movies by jumping through actors and the movies they've been in.

name: Moviedle
description: Guess the movie based on the given information, with each guess revealing matching information.

name: Moviedle (from Histordle)
description: Guess the year that the given movies were released.

name: Moviedle - Fill The Grid
description: Fill the grid with movies that contain actors from each cell's corresponding row and column.

name: Moviedle - Moviemoji
description: Guess the movie based on the given emojis.

name: Murdle
description: Solve today's murder-mystery logic puzzle.

name: Musicdoku
description: Fill in the grid with songs that meet the criteria of both the row and column corresponding to their cell.

name: Musicle
description: Match the song audio to the correct album art. Lots of categories.

name: MusicVidle
description: Guess the song based on selected frames from its music video.

name: Neighborle
description: Guess the countries that border the highlighted country on the map.

name: Nerdle
description: Guess the secret arithmetic equation.

name: NHLdle
description: Guess today's mystery NHL player.

name: Nodes
description: A puzzle game where you connect dots to reveal beautiful images.

name: Nookle
description: Guess the villager from Animal Crossing.

name: Number Island
description: Divide the number board into islands that match the target sums.

name: Numble
description: Reach the target number only using operations and each given number exactly once.

name: Numbobulate
description: Use the numbers and operations in the square to reach the target number.

name: NYT Connections
description: Group words that share a common thread.

name: NYT Connections: Sports Edition
description: Group sports terms that share a common thread.

name: NYT Mini Crossword
description: A very small crossword puzzle by the New York Times.

name: NYT Strands
description: Find hidden words and uncover the day's theme.

name: NYT Sudoku
description: Daily Sudoku puzzles from the New York Times.

name: NYT Wordle
description: Guess the 5-letter word in six or fewer attempts.

name: Octordle
description: Solve 8 Wordle puzzles at the same time. You have 13 guesses.

name: OEC Connectrade
description: Form groups of four exported products that are associated with one of the given countries.

name: OEC Pick 5
description: Guess the top 5 countries that export the most of the given product.

name: OEC Tradle
description: Guess the country by its exports.

name: On the Record
description: Answer the question based on the given quote, Monday through Thursday. Every Friday, you get 10 questions that will last through the weekend.

name: One Up Puzzle
description: Sudoku-style game where you need to fill segmented rows and columns with numbers.

name: One Word Search
description: Repeatedly search for the only word in a grid of letters.

name: Orbits
description: Place the 8 words in the correct order in the orbit by creating compound words or 2-word phrases.

name: OWdle
description: Daily games related to Overwatch 2. Guess the character or guess the conversation between two characters.

name: Padlock
description: Number puzzle game inspired by Wordle and Mastermind.

name: Palwordle
description: Daily games related to the video game Palworld.

name: Pandergram
description: Swap out letters from the given words to create new words that together use the entire alphabet.

name: pedantle
description: Find the secret Wikipedia page by revealing the words in its introduction.

name: Perfect Pitch Puzzle
description: After listening to a short tune, identify the first 6 notes that were played.

name: Petdle
description: Guess the pet taken from the game Super Auto Pets.

name: Phrasle
description: Reveal the phrase by guessing one letter at a time.

name: Picsey
description: Identify today's picture by flipping over as few tiles as possible.

name: Pivots
description: Sort the board by pivoting parts of it at a time.

name: Pixletters
description: Guess the word, except each letter is represented in a pixel grid.

name: Planespottle
description: Given an image of an airplane, determine the make, type, and the airline it belongs to.

name: Plotwords
description: Guess the name of the movie using as few plot keywords as possible!

name: PlusWord
description: Solve the mini crossword, then use letters in the shaded squares to figure out an additional word.

name: Pocket Puzzles
description: A collection of daily word games.

name: Poeltl
description: Guess the NBA player in 8 guesses.

name: Pokedle.com
description: Guess the daily Pokemon from all generations.

name: Pokedle.net
description: Guess the Pokemon in these daily quizzes.

name: Pokedoku
description: Fill out the grid with Pokémon matching the criteria of each cell's row and column.

name: Pokle
description: Guess the 5 board cards in this daily Texas Holdem challenge.

name: Polygonle
description: Guess the word in 6 tries, like Wordle. Each unique shape over a column represents a letter.

name: PopCultured
description: Guess the year given three pop culture items released that year.

name: Primel
description: Guess the 5-digit prime number in six guesses or less.

name: Puckdoku
description: Fill out the grid with hockey players matching the criteria of each cell's row and column.

name: Pufferdle
description: Catch a fish from the game Stardew Valley and then guess what fish it was.

name: Puzzmo - Bongo
description: Lay tiles onto the grid to spell the best 6 words you can.

name: Puzzmo - Crossword
description: Crosswords without getting stuck.

name: Puzzmo - Flipart
description: Rotate the pieces to fit them within the frame.

name: Puzzmo - Memoku
description: A daily sudoku game where you match numbers instead of entering them.

name: Puzzmo - Pile-Up Poker
description: Make poker hands by placing cards onto the grid.

name: Puzzmo - Really Bad Chess
description: Checkmate the opponent's king in this randomized Chess variant.

name: Puzzmo - Spelltower
description: Find words to clear tiles in the falling grid.

name: Puzzmo - Typeshift
description: Slide columns of letters to make words, using all of the letters along the way.

name: Puzzmo - Weather Memoku
description: Fill out grid by finding matching tiles. Each row and column have the same number of each tile.

name: Quickflip
description: Flip the tiles to make an 8 letter word. Two words are possible, but only one is the correct answer.

name: QuickQ
description: A 90 second trivia game with questions from 8 categories.

name: Quintalist
description: Correctly choose the top 5 entries in 5 tries or fewer.

name: Quintessential
description: Solve each of the 5 horizontal words in as few swaps as possible.

name: Quizl
description: Answer today's 5 trivia questions.

name: Quizmoji
description: Answer each clue with pairs of emojis.

name: Quordle
description: Solve 4 Wordle puzzles at the same time.

name: Quotesed
description: Guess the movie given 6 quotes.

name: RADDLE
description: Solve the word ladder by transforming each word in some way, with the scrambled clues as guidance.

name: Real Bird Fake Bird
description: Guess if each of the 7 prompts are real or fake (made up or don't belong).

name: Redactle
description: Guess the Wikipedia article by its content with keywords redacted.

name: Redividers
description: Find the word that fits the first blank, then split it to fill in the remaining blank(s).

name: regexle.com
description: Fill in the hexagon with sequences of characters that match the regular expressions listed around the edges.

name: regexle.ithea.de
description: Guess the secret regular expression by testing sequences of characters.

name: ReHeardle
description: Guess the song from listening to small parts of it.

name: ReHeardle Video Games
description: Guess the video game track from listening to small parts of it.

name: Relatle
description: Guess the word based on one of its synonyms, given a new synonym after each guess.

name: relatle.io
description: Get from one musical artist to another by linking through related artists.

name: Retro Game Trivia
description: Daily games where you guess the retro game that was released on this date in history.

name: Rhyme Time
description: Guess the three words that all rhyme.

name: Rivadle
description: A bunch of daily games where you guess the character from Marvel Rivals.

name: Rogule
description: A daily emoji dungeon crawler roguelike.

name: Rolldle
description: Guess the roll of the weapon from Destiny 2.

name: Rotaboxes
description: Rotate all the tiles into their correct orientation to reveal today's picture.

name: Runedle
description: Guess today's Runescape NPC.

name: Satle
description: Guess the city given a satellite image, zooming out after each guess.

name: Scramble
description: Guess as many valid words as possible for each row of a scrambled grid of letters.

name: Scrandle
description: Guess which scran (stadium food) is more popular based on their pictures and prices. If on mobile, rotate your phone to landscape mode for a better experience.

name: Searchle
description: Guess the secret word of the day by completing the Google search prompt.

name: sedecordle
description: Solve 16 wordles at the same time. You have 21 guesses.

name: Semantle
description: Guess words to see how close they are to the secret word semantically, eventually guessing the secret word.

name: Sequences
description: Guess the next number in today's sequence.

name: Sexaginta-quattuordle
description: Solve 64 Wordle puzzles at the same time.

name: Shaple
description: Choose the shape that matches the top shape.

name: Shikaku of the day
description: 5 daily Shikaku puzzles where you partition a grid into rectangles whose areas match the number inside them.

name: Silly Little Codes
description: Guess the word or phrase represented by today's code.

name: Smashdle
description: A bunch of daily games where you guess the character from Super Smash Bros.

name: Smixed
description: Make increasingly longer words using the given 6 letters, each word starting with a different letter.

name: Snapdle
description: Guess the card from the game Marvel Snap.

name: Songle
description: Guess the year given three songs that were released that year.

name: Songless
description: Guess the song from listening to small parts of it.

name: Sorted
description: Place the items in the correct order, 3 new rounds everyday.

name: Soulsborndle
description: Guess bosses from the Soulsborne games by their health, souls, weaknesses and resistances. For fans of Elden Ring, Dark Souls, Demon Souls, and Bloodborne.

name: SpaceWord
description: Create crosswords using all letters, using as little space as possible.

name: Spell Bee
description: Create words using the given 7 letters. Each word must contain the center letter.

name: Spellcheck
description: Spell the words correctly after listening to them.

name: Spellie
description: Wordle for young spellers with 3 difficulty modes.

name: Spelling Bee
description: Given 7 letters, make as many words as you can that contain the center letter. Same as NYT Spelling Bee, which requires a subscription.

name: Spindle
description: Rearrange the grid of letters so that the target word is spelled out. Rearranging is done by spinning words.

name: Spot the differences
description: Spot all of the differences in the two pictures.

name: Spotle
description: Guess the music artist in 10 tries, gaining new information based on each guess.

name: Squardle
description: A complex Wordle variant where your guesses count in two directions and cycle between three positions.

name: Squaredle
description: Find all the hidden words in a grid by connecting letters horizontally, vertically, or diagonally. Two puzzles each day.

name: Squares
description: Find all of the words in this daily Boggle game.

name: Squareword
description: Guess 5-letter words to uncover the square of words both horizontally and vertically.

name: Squeezy
description: Insert the given letters into the given words to make new words and reveal the secret word, phrase, or name.

name: Squirdle Daily
description: Guess today's pokemon within 9 guesses.

name: Stacked
description: Find groups of different sizes that share something in common.

name: Stackle
description: Build the tallest possible stack of words, swapping out one letter and scrambling the rest with each new word.

name: Stacks
description: Stack words from the word bank to create new words going horizontally. (From The Atlantic)

name: Stardewdle
description: Guess today's mystery crop from Stardew Valley.

name: Statele
description: Guess the US State by its outline on the map.

name: Steamdle
description: Guess the game based on the Steam review.

name: Stepdle
description: Solve 4 Wordle puzzles, one at a time, each word one letter longer than the last. You have 20 total guesses.

name: Streetfighterdle
description: Guess the daily Street Fighter character in as few tries as possible.

name: Summit Game
description: With one clue to get you started, find the 5 interconnected words to complete the summit in the shortest time.

name: Summle
description: Reach the target number using the given numbers and operations. Includes a junior mode and hard mode.

name: Sumplete
description: Delete numbers so that each row and column adds up to their target number.

name: Survivle
description: Try to lose the Wordle game by guessing 7 or more times, but you must utilize all gained information for each guess.

name: Swapple
description: Swap letters such that every row and column is a word.

name: Syllacrostic
description: Combine syllables to solve the clues.

name: Symble
description: A Wordle variant in which each game includes 3 randomly generated symbols, each meaning something different.

name: Synthmaze
description: Swap tiles in the maze so that the rocket reaches the exit.

name: Talldle
description: Sort the famous people from shortest to tallest.

name: Tarkovdle
description: Guess the weapon from Escape from Tarkov by its properties or sound.

name: Temple
description: Guess a duration or tempo by watchiing a flashing light, or give a duration or tempo by clicking.

name: Terradle
description: Guess today's weapon from the game Terraria.

name: TF2dle
description: Guess the Team Fortress 2 weapon, map, cosmetic or unusual effect based on attributes.

name: TFTdle
description: Daily games related to Teamfight Tactics.

name: The Atlantic Crossword
description: A daily crossword from The Atlantic.

name: The Daily Burgle
description: Burgle the vault by guessing movies whose plot descriptions contain words from the vault! By CineNerdle.

name: The Wiki Game Daily
description: Race from one Wikipedia page to the target page using as few links as possible

name: Thirdle
description: Solve 3 Wordle puzzles crossed together.

name: Three Magic Words
description: Place letters in the empty spaces to form 3 words. Five rounds per day.

name: Threepeat
description: Complete three words with the same three letters, three rounds everyday.

name: Thrice
description: Answer today's 5 trivia questions, each from a different category.

name: Tightrope
description: Answer 9 timed trivia questions without running out of lives!

name: Timdle
description: Place 8 historical events in chronological order.

name: TimeGuessr
description: Guess the right time and location of each historical photo.

name: TimeLine Game
description: Arrange the historical events in the order they happened.

name: Toddle
description: Guess the secret word or phrase, starting with a 4-letter word whose letters appear in the same order.

name: Top 5
description: Guess the top 5 items of today's category.

name: Toppled
description: Topple the letter wall by finding four 5-letter words

name: Tracell
description: Uncover the hidden text by placing the letter tiles in the grid.

name: travle
description: Connect the starting country to the ending country by naming countries in between them.

name: Triplets
description: Find as many triplets as you can in 3 minutes. A triplet is a set of 3 cards whose attributes are either all the same or all different.

name: Truncate
description: Place a chain of tiles on the board and reach the opponent's base before they reach yours.

name: Twofer Goofer
description: Guess the pair of rhyming words that form the given nonsensical phrase.

name: Unolingo
description: Solve the clueless crossword by using each letter of the English alphabet exactly once.

name: Unshuffle
description: Unshuffle the grid using the numbers along each row and column as a guide.

name: Unzoomed
description: Guess the city based on the given satellite image.

name: Valodle
description: Test your Valorant knowledge in these daily games.

name: Verticle
description: A vertical variant of Wordle.

name: Video Game Bandle
description: Guess the video game and song played by the MIDI band

name: VideoPuzzle
description: Swap tiles to unscramble the puzzle of a looping short video.

name: Vowel Play
description: Guess the words with their vowels removed.

name: Vox Daily Crossword
description: A free daily crossword from Vox, skips Sundays.

name: Waffle
description: Swap letters to create words both horizontally and vertically. Seems to have been made before Word Waffle.

name: Weaver
description: Weave your way from the start word to the end word, changing only one letter at a time.

name: Weddle
description: Guess the NFL player within 8 guesses.

name: WhenTaken
description: Guess the year and location of the given photo.

name: WhenTaken Movies
description: Guess where and when the given movie scene was filmed.

name: Where in the USA is this?
description: Guess the location in the United States given 5 pictures of the same place, one at a time.

name: WhereTaken
description: Guess the Country/Region in which the photo was taken.

name: WhereTaken USA
description: Guess the US State in which the photo was taken.

name: Which year
description: Guess which year each photo was taken.

name: Wildlife Sudoku
description: Guess 9 animals that properly fill in the grid.

name: Worchle
description: Find the keyword in the word search before running out of guesses. Three increasingly difficult puzzles everyday.

name: Word Box
description: Swap letters until each row and column forms a valid word.

name: Word Chain
description: Connect the two unrelated words by adding a chain of related words between them.

name: Word Chase
description: Guess the secret word within 5 tries, receiving a new word as a hint before each guess.

name: Word Connection
description: Link a chain of 4 relevant words together.

name: Word Grid
description: Fill the cells in the grid with words matching the criteria of both their row and column

name: Word Ladder
description: Change one word into another by switching one letter at a time, keeping a valid word at each step.

name: Word Peaks
description: Guess the word in 6 tries. After each guess, it will show whether each letter occurs earlier or later in the alphabet compared to the corresponding letter in the secret word.

name: Word to your Mother
description: Guess all possible Wordle words based on the two starting words and their results.

name: Word Waffle
description: Swap letters to create words both horizontally and vertically.

name: Word500
description: Guess the word in 8 tries, but you're only given how many guessed letters are in the right place or wrong place.

name: WordAll
description: Guess all of the Wordle words, given the starting clues.

name: Wordcell
description: Find the hidden words on the board by throwing the ball, picking letters up along the way.

name: Wordcrux
description: A mini crossword puzzle, but don't make too many wrong guesses.

name: Wordga
description: Find as many 4+ letter words using today's letters.

name: Wordiply
description: Try to make the longest word that contains the given word in 5 tries or less.

name: Wordistance
description: Keep guessing words until you find the mystery word, each guess revealing the distance between the guessed word and mystery word.

name: Wordless
description: Solve Wordle puzzles of various sizes.

name: WordLink
description: Rearrange the words to form a chain of two-word phrases.

name: WordLinx
description: Using a single word as a clue, guess the 4 related words by dragging and dropping letters into the empty spaces.

name: Wordloop
description: Place segments on the circle such that each pair of segments forms a valid word.

name: words for days
description: A word alchemy game with a daily objective, like infinite craft.

name: Worldle
description: Guess the country by its shape on the world map.

name: Worpel
description: Guess the player in the Australian Football League (AFL).

name: WrestlePlay
description: A collection of daily games related to wrestling.

name: Wrodeo
description: Reveal the quote or book passage by guessing one word at a time, starting with some letters already shown.

name: xdle
description: Guess the number between 1 and 999, receiving math clues related to each guess. You have 6 guesses.

name: Yeardle
description: Guess the year based on the given historical events of that year.

name: Zaku Chess
description: A challenging chess game with fantasy pixel-art characters. Note that the chess board is rotated 90 degrees clockwise.

name: Zebra Puzzles
description: A collection of 5 daily logic puzzles of increasing difficulty.

name: Zeldadle
description: Test your Zelda knowledge in these daily games.

name: ZoomOut
description: Guess the video game from the zoomed-in screenshot.
